pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inadyn, or In-a-Dyn, is a small and simple Dynamic DNS, DDNS, client with HTTPS support. Commonly available in many GNU/Linux distributions, used in off the shelf routers and Internet gateways to automate the task of keeping your Internet name in sync with your public IP address. It can also be used in installations with redundant (backup) connections to the Internet.
